description.narrative: The purpose of the Emergency COVID-19 Response Project in Uzbekistan is to prevent, detect and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19(Coronavirus) and strengthen national systems for public health preparedness. This project consists of three components. The first component will strengthen the national health system to respond to COVID-19(Coronavirus). This component has three subcomponents: (i) surveillance and rapid response capacity strengthening; (ii) strengthening the capacity for management of severely and critically ill COVID-19 (Coronavirus) patients, and: (iii) risk communication and community engagement strengthening. Component two provides financial support to individuals and households. This component consists of two subcomponents: (i)scaling up temporary cash benefits targeted to low-income families, and; (ii) providing a one-off cash unemployment benefit. Component three is implementation management and monitoring and evaluation (M&E). This component will support the administrative and human resources needed to implement the project and monitor and evaluate progress.

condition.narrative: The Recipient, through MoH and MoF, shall adopt, within one (1) month from the Effective Date, in form and substance satisfactoryto the Association, a Project Operation Manual (“Project Operation Manual”) containing detailed guidelines and procedures for theimplementation of the Project, including the Environmental and Social Commitment Plan (ESCP).

title.narrative: Online citizen engagement mechanism: (i) established with outreach and staffing (ii) actively providing information (iii) receivingcitizen feedback and (iv) PIU/MoH providing just-in-time responses

baseline.value: Online citizen engagement channel is not available

target.value: Online citizen engagement channel (i) established, (ii) actively providing citizens with official COVID and project information,(iii) receiving feedback from citizens, and (iv) the PIU/MOH reporting back on actions annually.

actual.value: Online citizen engagement channel is not available
